gbh_tool_latest.name: GBH Tool
gbh_tool_latest.message: If you're running v2.1.0 beta1 and lower I recommend you to remove add-on and restart Blender before installing the updates.
changelog: Feature: particle systems to hair curves conversion
Feature: attach hair curves to objects surface
Improvement: module reloading logic for cleaner update installation
Improvement: under the hood library logic
Change: update checking system with 24 hrs checking intervals
